location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Captain G Walker, Senior Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Riach's letter concerns the movements of the cruizer Antelope, which had gone to Bahrine [Bahrain] and Abothabee [Abu Dhabi] to obtain information about the seizure of boats in the area, and the cruizer Nautilus, which for want of anchors had been forced to proceed to Bassidore [Bāsa‘īdū].
